Your account will be deactivated immediately, and you will no longer be able to log in or use any functions. Subscribed services will be automatically terminated. (Since this APP does not offer paid services, there will be no additonal charges.)

During the desctivation period, your account data (such as profile nickname, avatar, chat history, ete.) will be temporarily retained but cannot be abbessed or restored.\n If you want to permanently delete the data, please select the Delete Acdount operation.
You can restore your account within 30 days by re- logging in or contacting customer service. After 30 days, the account and data will be pemanently deleted.
I have read and agree to the account deactivation terms

Your account will be permanently deleted and cannot be restored.All account - related data, including personal profiles, chat history, uploaded content, etc., will be permanently erased.Subscribed services will be terminated immediately. Currently, there is no paid content in this APP.

Upon confirming account deletion, your data will be stored for 7 days. If you don't log in during this period, it will be permanently erased from our database thereafter.Due to compliance requirements or legal obligations, certain data such as chats records and logs may need to be retained for a certain period.
Account cancellation is an irreversible operation. Please choose carefully.
I have read and agree to the account deletion terms
